news.title: Woman (43) set on fire in Clondalkin fights for life as case upgraded to attempted murder
news.summary: Gardaí are now treating as attempted murder the case in which a woman was set on fire when she answered the door to her Clondalkin home.

news.title: Billy Burns sentenced to life in prison for murder of his mother Miriam at her Co Kerry home three years ago
news.summary: A 55-year-old Kerry man has been sentenced to life imprisonment for the “violent” murder of his “wonderful” and “hardworking” mother - described as someone who “always had a smile for everyone” - whom he strangled to death at her Killarney home three years ago.

news.title: More than 5,000 children face Christmas in emergency accommodation as new record homelessness figures revealed
news.summary: More than 16,700 people were living in emergency accommodation last month, bringing homeless figures to another record high.

news.title: Judge says the idea that Enoch Burke is being imprisoned for religious beliefs is ‘nonsense’ as he makes damages ruling
news.summary: The High Court has ruled that jailed teacher Enoch Burke’s salary be used to pay damages of €15,000 to Wilson’s Hospital School.

news.title: Conor McKeon: The perfect ending to Kellie Harrington’s career is for her to decide
news.summary: In the same way as James Cameron hadn’t much scope to write a sequel to Titanic, it really does feel as though this Kellie Harrington comeback lacks any narrative footing.

news.title: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky’s visit to Ireland scrapped as his chief of staff resigns amid corruption investigation
news.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky’s visit to Ireland next month has been scrapped, the Irish Independent understands.

news.title: ‘Great error of judgment’: Regina Doherty says it’s ‘hard to accept’ Ceann Comhairle’s explanation over Sinn Féin photo call
news.summary: Fine Gael MEP Regina Doherty has said it is “hard to accept” the explanation from Ceann Comhairle Verona Murphy about her decision to pose for a photograph with Sinn Féin TDs and senators.

news.title: Katie Taylor, Rachael Blackmore and Arthur Gourounlian joining Patrick Kielty on tonight’s Late Late Show
news.summary: Olympic gold medallist Katie Taylor, champion jockey Rachael Blackmore, and Dancing with the Stars judge Arthur Gourounlian are some of the names joining Patrick Kielty on tonight’s Late Late Show.

news.title: Money experts share the Black Friday deals they’ll be snapping up today – and the ones to avoid
news.summary: FOMO (fear of missing out) is a real thing in many scenarios, especially on the now mega-marketing holiday that is Black Friday. Trying to tame that fear will be key when surrounded by so much temptation.

news.title: Modern Morals: ‘I’m in a new relationship and I like him, but an old flame reached out and I’m tempted to reply. Should I?’
